source.name: Climate Reference Network Hourly02 Product
source.description: The U.S. Climate Reference Network is designed specifically to monitor national climate change with best scientific practice and adherence to the accepted principles of climate observations. USCRN  hourly temperature, precipitation, global solar radiation, and surface infrared temperature data are available in the Hourly02 file set for all stations in the network.  Hourly average relative humidity is available for most stations.
